Text: men lol..efter 2 timmar står den på 0%..seeda
har stått på i 8 timmar nu.och gissa vad den står på!...0%!!!!!

It sure is nice of you to share....BUT

These rar files are junk, a waste, and nobody needs them.  They don't help at all.

Don't compress something that is already compressed.
IF it is a rar file, I stop the download, throw it away, and curse the person who wasted my time.

So in summary, if you have a brain - just give us the DVD files - .BUF, .IFO, etc..

Or give us a NERO ISO file.

I don't want your RAR files.
